doc.title: GIF

value.content: GIF (Graphics Interchange Format) is an image format that uses lossless compression and can be used for animations. A GIF uses up to 8 bits per pixel and a maximum of 256 colors from the 24-bit color space.

value.title: See also
value.content: • GIF on Wikipedia
